verbs.description: [ARG1: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [V: are] [ARG2: to meet in Singapore on Tuesday for a summit that will be the first of its kind between leaders of the rival nations] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] are to [V: meet] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARGM-PRP: for a summit that will be the first of its kind between leaders of the rival nations] .
President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un are to meet in Singapore on Tuesday for a summit that [V: will] be the first of its kind between leaders of the rival nations .

President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un are to meet in Singapore on Tuesday for [ARG1: a summit] [R-ARG1: that] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: be] [ARG2: the first of its kind between leaders of the rival nations] .
